bridge-type.label: Salus Cloud
bridge-type.description: This bridge serves as a critical connection point to the Salus cloud. It's absolutely necessary for the integration of other Salus devices into the ecosystem, as it provides a pathway for them to interact with the Salus cloud. Without this bridge, the devices would be unable to send, receive or exchange data with the cloud platform, hindering functionality and data utilization.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username/Email
parameter.description: The username or email associated with your Salus account. This is required for authentication with the Salus cloud.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password for your Salus account. This is used in conjunction with the username or email for authentication purposes.

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: Salus API URL
parameter.description: The base URL for the Salus cloud. Typically, this should remain as the default, unless directed to change by Salus.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds at which the connection to the Salus cloud should be refreshed to ensure up-to-date data.

parameter.name: propertiesRefreshInterval
parameter.label: Device Property Cache Expiration
parameter.description: The period (in seconds) after which the cached device properties will be discarded and re-fetched fresh from the Salus cloud.

parameter.name: maxHttpRetries
parameter.label: Max HTTP Retries
parameter.description: How many times HTTP requests can be retried
